Author: jl777c#5810
Content:
AssetValidate error is saying that assets are being burned. That is a violation of the rules as assets need to always be preserved, so the bug is in the construction of the tx.
vin2 100, vin3 999999900, vout2 100, vout3 999999850, inputs 10.00000000 vs 9.99999950 outputs

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: maybe the tokenfillbid isnt handling a too large request? fillamount is how much of the totalrequired you are filling

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and again I need to ask for basic questions like what command was issued to get the AssetValidate error. I should have to guess what exact fillbid command was used. When there are precise bug reports I will fix them

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: without it, it can go for months and nothing will be fixed
